data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chakrabarti, Samiran, Pandit, Ramkrishna, Sur, Surajit (2019): New genera, a new species, and a key to the genera of Ashieldophyinae (Acari, Eriophyoidea) from India. ZooKeys 843: 39-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.843.29078, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.843.29078
